summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IFS Seeds e-commerce platform - Backend APIs (100% success), Frontend UI and Admin functionality tested

ui_bugs.issue: Add to Cart buttons not visible on shop/products listing page, only works from product detail page
Category filter buttons (Legumes, Cash Crops, Spices) not clickable or not working properly

passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with Hero, Products, About, Team, Contact sections
User registration and admin login functional
Admin dashboard accessible with proper navigation menu
Add to cart works from product detail page
Contact form and all page navigation works
Admin CRUD operations for products working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix shop page Add to Cart buttons visibility/functionality and ensure category filter buttons work properly on products listing page
